list.abs: He lives a carefree life in the country ., 他在乡下过着悠然的日子.
Leaving university Brought my carefree days to an end ., 离开大学结束了我无忧无虑的日子.
五月花坊  - 第50页 -... ... Reine des Violettes' 雷纳的紫萝兰 CareFree Delight 卡菲迪赖 Vineyard Song 葡萄园之歌.
士林官邸玫瑰群芳谱2011 - 从外双溪看世界 -... ... 森巴舞曲 Rio Samba 无忧快乐 Carefree Delight 无忧无虑 Carefree Spirit.

course , designed , good quality bed of fabric , you must not only bring decent image appearance is carefree mood is night sleep peacefully experience .当然，设计精美，品质优良的床上布艺，带给你的绝不仅是体面可人的外观，更是自由自在的心情，是一夜安眠的体验。

means.word_mean: 1. the cheerful feeling you have when nothing is troubling you
2. the trait of being without worry or responsibility

auth_sentence.content: Everyone I Know Is Listening To Crunk adopts a Thrills-ian feel while Midnight Surprise is wrapped in cosy carefreeness.
